short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily share content on social media with just one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Found something interesting , now you can share it with just one click only. Across all social media. There is no need to copy the URL by click into  the address bar. If you want to share a specific article or an entire page so share it with just single click only.
